QuestData.Title: Hatred Becomes Us
QuestData.Description: I should have suspected a sha presence earlier!$B$BWe are safe as long as we stand inside the Totem of Harmony's protective wards, but many of our people were not so lucky.$B$BThey were trapped outside the camp when the sha's powers manifested, and now they turn upon each other!$B$BTake one of my totems with you. Place the totem near a crazed ally to purify them, but beware.$B$BYou may have to face the darkness that gripped them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Totem of Harmony to exorcise sha spirits from 8 Crazed Shado-Pan Rangers. Defeat the Seething Hatreds to purify your allies.
QuestData.CompletionText: Our people are possessed by hatred. We must help them come to their senses!
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you.$B$BThe sha preys upon the weak and the vulnerable.$B$BIf we are not vigilant, even the strongest of us can succumb to the sha's dark influence.
